sources.title: Radio Girl (1932)
sources.description: A radio station catches fire, and the mouse-girl that does the exercise program is trapped on the studio's upper floor. A boy mouse listener pulls her to safety through his radio at home. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/radio-girl-1932/

metadata.Plot: A radio station catches fire, and the mouse-girl that does the exercise program is trapped on the studio's upper floor. A boy mouse listener pulls her to safety through his radio at home.
